A Sequoia Tree takes 300 years to reach its full potential.  Much like your team there is always another layer of success to be had. Over 400 Firms have trusted us to be their partner in the past 20 years.

Managed the wholesale distribution of fixed life and annuity products including equity indexed products through brokerage general agencies in AZ, CA, HI, ID, NV, OR, UT, and WA. Recruited to and promoted the sale of product lines through agency seminars, webinars, and industry events. Served as the organization’s national spokesperson for all major events. Acted as an advocate for field associates as well as a liaison with the home office. Hired, trained, and managed the first internal wholesaler. Recruited the two largest and only true national marketing organizations to date. Increased single premium life and periodic premium life sales by 40% and 900% respectively in 2014. Region accounted for 50% of total periodic premium life sales along with 40% of the overall policy count annually from 2014 through 2017. 2015 Leading by Example Award recipient.

Responsible for the wholesale brokerage distribution of fixed life, annuities, long-term care, and disability income insurance products to independent investment professionals throughout the United States. Provided advanced markets case design and consultation to selling agents and their clients via point-of-sale meetings and presentations. Developed and implemented innovative sales, recruiting, and marketing initiatives which were in alignment with the overall strategic growth of the organization. Conducted advanced sales and product training through individual one-on-one and group meetings including seminars and workshops. Worked closely with core carrier contacts to facilitate and coordinate training visits, promotional programs, and business development opportunities.

Wholesaled fixed life insurance and annuity products including equity indexed products to brokerage general agencies in DC, DE, MD, NJ, NY, PA, and VA. Trained, educated, and promoted the sale of all products with a focus on living benefits and guaranteed lifetime income through agency seminars, webinars, and Brainshark presentations. Strategically planned and managed the deployment of resources to maximize sales while being responsible for budgeting and expenses. Led all RVPs with 13 newly recruited agencies. Managed and grew relationships within a startup territory to achieve overall territory growth goals with $1,600,000 in life and $22,000,000 in annuity sales.

Wholesaled variable and fixed life insurance products to wirehouses, independent broker-dealers, and financial institutions in DC, DE, MD, and VA. Implemented a top-down/bottom-up marketing plan focused on developing strong working relationships with centers of influence and strategic partners such as brokerage general agencies and regional insurance coordinators. Educated financial advisors and their clients on the benefits of individual life and corporate owned life insurance products through individual point-of-sale presentations and group meetings. Increased total life sales by 85% to $4,700,000 in 2007. Ranked 3rd for wirehouse sales and 5th overall across all channels among 25 RLCs. Selected by management to serve on Nationwide’s Marketing Advisory Council. 2007 Pacesetter Award winner.

Enhanced the national wholesale distribution of life, annuity, and long-term care insurance products to brokerage general agencies through the creation and presentation of live continuing education seminars. Delivered product training via marketing materials, webinars, and advanced planning workshops. Participated in the development and launch of 6 fixed life insurance products. Developed financial strategies for product promotions to a broad distribution base with an emphasis on the Middle Market. Authored articles which appeared in such publications as Life Insurance Selling and National Underwriter Life & Health.
Bachelor of Science in Business Administration
Double Major in Management and Economics
Indexed Annuity and Indexed Life Issues

Mark Triplett
Chief Business Development Officer
October 11, 2017, Mark was a client of Sean’s

Sean Shotzberger is a valuable resource for agencies, field agents, and marketing companies operating in the insurance and annuity space. His comprehension of what consumers want, their buying behaviors, and decision making process allows him to conceptually position a company's financial services products in a way that resonates. He also appreciates what it takes to get business written and placed. In economically challenging times, he knows carriers must run a lean operation in order to maintain profitability and while meeting policy holder expectations. This makes him a valuable resource for insurance companies looking to distribute their quality products through field agencies and national marketing companies.

Sean Shotzberger is one of the top external wholesalers that I have ever worked with.  His in depth knowledge of the industry goes beyond what most would consider an expert.  It is that knowledge, along with his winning personality and unmatched relationship building skills that allows him to be so successful at what he does best - Sales.  Sean was both a leader as well as an innovator when I saw him first hand out in the field.  His presentation skills and ability to translate complex information into layman's term was exciting to watch.  He and I did many meetings together and I know that part of my success was having a colleague like Sean by my side.  He would be a tremendous asset to any organization.
